creator: onealj@apache.org
text: XSSFComment and HSSFComment do not implement equals, which could be helpful when making comparisons between objects.

Created attachment 33731
patch for HSSFCommet and XSSFComment with equals and hashCode methods

Patch is missing unit tests for equals and hashCode methods
creator: onealj@apache.org
onealj@apache.org
text: Added equals and hashCode methods in r1748814. Still missing unit tests.

creator: onealj@apache.org
text: Added a poor man's unit test in r1748827.
